name: Qreator
description: Qreator is a QR code generator. It can convert URL, location, text and other information to QR code. It's convenient and easy-to-transmit with simple design.

en_US.description: Qreator is a QR code generator. It can convert URL, location, text and other information to QR code. It's convenient and easy-to-transmit with simple design.
en_US.name: Qreator

zh_CN.description: Qreator是一个二维码生成工具，它可以将网址、地理位置、文本等信息转成QR码，具有外观设计简洁，方便易用，便于传播等功能。
zh_CN.name: Qreator
